alert.note: Alert for Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:40AM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches except between 2 and 4 inches above 7,500 feet. Winds gusting to between 45 and 55 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Highlands, Upper Rio Grande Valley, and Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Upper Rio Grande Valley
